title: inb4 Threads complaining about Katarina new splash...

replies.body: They got her face all wrong IMO.  She was a lot cuter.

She's not supposed to look "cute". She's a Noxian assassin. Taught to be proud, strong and pure EVIL! (Ok I'm kidding about the evil thing)

If you look at the cinematic with Kat in them, she looks a lot closer to the new splash than her current splash.

I think it's cool Riot is willing to give their champions more personality in their looks. We already have a bunch of cute/sexy champions. Vicious Kat is way better than baby face Kat.

Also it has always been said that her sister Cassiopeia is the more beautiful/attractive one of the sisters. Now it actually might be true :P
Well Kat is still kinda hot though... in a different way.

I'm sorry but the "A New Dawn" face was a lot better...

https://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/1729/7245/original.jpg

everything about a new dawn was beautiful
riot has some seriously talented people working on their cinematics
But it's still closer to the new splash than the current one.

Yea but the new one looks like

http://www.picturesnew.com/media/images/what-meme.png
Agreed, for some odd reason, this picture reminds me of the expression Anne Hathaway makes in some movies.

There's no law saying empowered women, or killers, need to be ugly.  That's like saying all blonde females must be dumb.  I was watching John Wick last night (that murder spree to dub step was pretty awesome) and that one assassin in it was fairly nice looking.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZRYiq0t7,comment-id=000000010003,timestamp=2015-02-13T00:51:37.242+0000)
>
> There's no law saying empowered women, or killers, need to be ugly.  That's like saying all blonde females must be dumb.  I was watching John Wick last night (that murder spree to dub step was pretty awesome) and that one assassin in it was fairly nice looking.

How is any of this relevant to the fact yall pathetic humans are trying to relate sexually to the fucking VIRTUAL BOARD GAME YOU PLAY... 

ZZZZ  every day I find a new reason to regret being a comat vet in this GLORIOUS country of ours. Glad civilians are online trying to wack off while playing league instead of playing....


Is this why raging bronzies exist?  Cant decide **THUD THUD THUD** click click**THUD****CICK***THUDTHUDTHUDTHUD*** SHIT!!! I DIED now i can't finish on her face and its ur fault....


L2P Life...or do us a favor and uninstall.

Kind of a jumbled insult.. but I agree, the sexualization of characters has to stop, although it's unlikely, because even though Riot is more understanding than most companies, they are still a company, and they want to make money, so they'll keep sexualizing characters and putting cleavage out there to satisfy the cast majority of the community.

I have a lot of friends who have served and have been in combat and the last thing they do is brag about it on an internet forum and use it as a reason to degrade others.  They are proud and humble for what they've done.  What's your excuse?

You're upset about people sexualizing artwork and your name is "Oops I OVULATED."  Very mature.  In fact, your post history seems to just flame people and is oozing of someone with low self-esteem who needs to judge others to try and make themselves feel better.  I'd expect more from a solider, if in fact you really are a combat veteran because you don't represent any of those ideals in how you articulate yourself here.

May have served, may have learned what it really gets person.  "They are proud and humble for what they've done."  You clearly don't have any inkling to that " What They've Done" part entails. 

  I am on here for fun, hence my immature name.   Its a forums and 900% of posting internet is TROLLING, anyone who tells you otherwise is an idiot.  I can get on, and be who and what I want.  I post under many names and have different reasons for why I do on each account.   None of this is relevant and you took time to research into something I created.  Again this is no excuse for trying to add in and break down a fact the is over OVER IRRELEVANT 

 "The sexualization of characters has to stop"-CarBen

  Our community leader uses Reddit and doesn't post on our forums.  When I think of REDDIT and 4CHAN I think of CP/VIRUSES/TROLLS/PRONS.  Why? Because most of that kind of material comes from those 2 sources. Its no wonder our champions are becoming more and more sex oriented.

Oh look I did what you did, took an IRRELEVANCE point and ran with it, while proving valid points it provides nothing.

Nuff said on this topic, anything more is defending your hurt pride for being a dick head.

  I expect to be the bad guy, because I only speak truth. I rush head first knowing truth and honesty mean more then the lies you tell yourself to get through each day.   Truth scares people, and makes me the enemy.

> [{quoted}](name=oops I OVULATED,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZRYiq0t7,comment-id=000000010003000000010000,timestamp=2015-02-13T23:20:57.320+0000)
>   I am on here for fun, hence my immature name. **  Its a forums and 900% of posting internet is TROLLING**, anyone who tells you otherwise is an idiot. ** I can get on, and be who and what I want.  I post under many names and have different reasons for why I do on each account.   **

And you judge other people on these forums for having no life...

Good to know you admit to being a liar and an immature child.
It's supposed to be someone Garen fell in love with.
Last I checked the only name he knew how to call out was "Demacia" so i think he's gonna be celebrating single awareness day with the rest of us until he gets that fixed.

I agree 100%.

I never even noticed she had a face before, but this is just horrible.

Why should katarina be cute?
She is a sadistic assassin,she shouldn't look cute,she should look badass,sexy and menacing.
Shovels aren't menacing.
You've clearly never been hit by one.
Or he was hit a few times too often by one.
Shovels aren't sexy
Why shouldn't she be?

she is a menacing character so she should look menacing.

I mean if sion looked cute,would it really fit his character?Not really.
Same goes for katarina.She can and should look sexy,but cute simply doesn't fit her.

I don't think she is all that menacing.  She is a dancing assassin.  Well-toned and well-traiend, but brought up in Noxian aristocracy.  If anything, I think she should look as little like an assassin as possible... right up until you kills you.

She is the woman who runs around  "Why? Because I can." I mean her selection quote is "Violence solves everything!"

Seriously,she is a sadistic assassin,who receives pleasure from inflicting pain on others and loves to assassinate strong targets,how is that not menacing?If you didn't see her as menacing before then it only shows that the previous splash art failed to deliver that feeling.
Then the cinematic also failed in that aspect.  Furthermore, this splash makes her look retarded... not menacing.

quotes from her lore:

*"Driven by an intense killer instinct, Katarina uses her talents as an assassin for the glory of Noxus, and the continued elevation of her family."*

*"From childhood, Katarina displayed a natural gift for combat. As the daughter of a prominent Noxian general, many paths were open to her, but she rejected them all for the path of the blade."*

*"Stalking him to his tent, she quietly dispatched his guards and slit his throat. **Pleased with her impressive kill**, *she disappeared into the night."*

hello sadism.

"Bloody and bruised, Katarina barely escaped the Demacian forces, and returned to Noxus a changed woman. The scar she earned that night now serves as a constant reminder that she must never let passion interfere with duty."*

cute is not a word to associate with katarina, ever. while i still think the updated splash art could use some tweaking here and there, i do feel it shows a lot more of her actual personality than the previous one. she rejected the aristocratic life and she doesn't "dance" in the pretty way i think you imagine - it's literally a dance with death if you are close enough to her.

death isn't cute.

"Death isn't cute."

Says you.
Please something of this type http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140802092827/leagueoflegends/images/5/57/Katarina_New_Dawn_concept_1.jpg
Its new skin for kata: Horse-face Katarina - 750 rp

Riot, why?  I hate everything about it.

I don't know how to describe it except she just looks unattractive on so many levels.  The angle and artwork are just odd and are about as unflattering as you could get.

Please don't do this.

Yes, the old "angles" made her much more attractive.

What is this Classy smut they are trying to peddle to us?

How am I supposed to fap to this new spash art?

Rito PLS!

I like it. 

It's more in line with her feel as a champion and it fits in with the design style of the other splash art reworks.
It's not what she is at all. Shovel face and that pose is horrible and don't fit the Katarina I know at all.
Riot; inflicting more pain and suffering than I could ever hope to match.
Riot fixing what is not broken.

Those hips sure are bony. And I'd prefer a more natural redhead look to what seems like copious amounts of eldritch pink hair dye here. But, other than that, I absolutely love it. Grim and determined rather than cute and sassy. Better representative of her character if you ask me.
To be fair unnatural hair colors are canon,
Why does she look like a female Shaco now?
Someone photoshoped it and it looks better.

> [{quoted}](name=Xore,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZRYiq0t7,comment-id=002a,timestamp=2015-02-13T03:43:40.324+0000)
>
> Someone photoshoped it and it looks better.

How could it look worse ?

just copy paste new dawn face.
problem solved.
I don't know what is going on with splash artists. I want to think they are just troll baiting us.

I very much dislike the new splash face it's so not her. It's way to rough, makes her look like an old hag on crack, and her lips look like she had some botox on only half her mouth. She's always been my favorite. Don't screw her up.

http://i.imgur.com/zCN78hp.jpg

^ my edit?
Totally agree. The current one is waaay better.

another fugly sivir icon ;') 
you did the best job riot - to ruin katarina
i dont even know how do i play kat anymore seeing this icon.
seriously can we just use the WKK icon or the new dawn face pls

Dislocated knee/10

 It almost seemed like the long nightmare of awful splash arts replacing good splash arts was over. Guess not :(
 ~Uiru

Most of the bad ones didnt make it through.

Except Ahri's ;-;
It's Ahri all over again in terms of community reaction..................& the splash arts.
